subject: Reaching out to you via {{referrer_name}}
message:
Hi {{first_name}},

My name is {{your_name}}, I was given your name by {{referrer_name}}. I run a {{industry}} business and it sounds like we could benefit from knowing one another! I browsed through your siteâ€”love {{compliment}}.

If you ever want to meet up for coffee or have a phone/video chat to exchange ideas, let me know! You can also call or text me at {{contact_number}}.

Have a great rest of your week,

{{your_name}}
